General.Name: Adways Inc
General.Description: Adways Inc. provides affiliate advertisement services for PC and mobiles, and mobile application and content development services in Japan, China, Taiwan, the Philippines, Korea, Hong Kong, Singapore, and the United States. The company offers Unicorn, a marketing platform for mobile apps; AppDriver, a CPI based mobile ad platform; Smart-C, a mobile web affiliate service; JANet, a Web affiliate service for PCs; and YACLE, a supporting service for advertisement expressions. It also provides Old Rookie Sauna that operates on a membership, invitation, reservation, and subscription basis; Yoyaku Top10, a pre-registration platform for smart phone apps; SPOT, an online media that delivers going out and travelling by gathering sightseeing information based on locals; and mukuri, a media service that shares lifestyle-related likes and interests of users. In addition, the company offers services for digitalization of companies comprising media development, management, and outsourcing; SaaS agency; and advertising, PR, and branding services. Further, it provides MediaAnalyzer for media analysis and trend cause-and-effect visioning; VIDEO ANALYZER for video viewership analysis; MarketingDashboard for market data analysis; DeliverySimulator for delivery simulation; X for cross-sectional media monitoring; Best Practice Checker for delivery optimization management; STROBELIGHTS, a performance advertisement data tool; Infinity Expansion for infinitely extended logic targeting; CREATIVE LAB., a creative management tool; CreativeDashboard for creative effectiveness analysis; Dobel for automatic generation of video creatives; and MASSIVE, a creative tool for automated mass production of banners. Adways Inc. was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
General.Address: Sumitomo Fudousan Shinjuku Grand Tower, Tokyo, Japan, 160-6138
